comment: Membership in a restricted class abstraction, expressed with explicit class substitution. (The variation ~ elrabf has implicit substitution). The hypothesis specifies that ` x ` must not be a free variable in ` B ` . (Contributed by NM, 30-Sep-2003.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
